attributes.action: The government needs to help out the university students.
attributes.additional_details:
The universities have now closed and all students will be working on line. 
My daughter is now on her way home as she won’t have the money to pay for her upkeep due to her work being closed. 
All students are on yearly contract and have now lost out on so much money that they and us as parents can not afford. 
I am asking your help in making sure the university and the accommodations reimburse the students.
attributes.background: The government needs to help out the university students. My daughter as many has paid for her accommodations and tuition for the academic year!
